title: Soccer Bros Unblocked
description: Lace up and hit the pitch in _Soccer Bros_, the fast-paced online soccer brawl where skill meets pure chaos! Enjoy action-packed matches full of tackles, power-shots, and wild physics that keep every game unpredictable. _Soccer Bros_ delivers quick, competitive fun for casual players and esports hopefuls alike. Customize your bro, dominate the field, and score your way to glory in the ultimate browser-based soccer showdown!
instructions:
WASD or Arrow keys to control your player

Space to tackle or shoot
